Details

Build amazing Tabs

Sections Pro allows you to build amazing tabs for your home, landing, and product pages. For each tab, you can add rich content, columns, media, and more.

Choose from Rich Text, Images, Videos and more

Create columns within tabs!

SEO Friendly! Tabs and content are built to be Google ready.

Shipping

Space saving!

Tabs are a great way to save space in any layout. You can put important customer information like shipping, return policies and more behind tabs so you can still have that elegant product page while still answering all the questions your customers have.
